totems.name: Otter
totems.guidance: Balance playfulness with responsibility. Your creativity flows when you embrace joy.
totems.teaching: Otter teaches us to find joy in life's currents and adapt with grace.

totems.name: Wolf
totems.guidance: Trust your instincts. Your pack is your strength, but solitude brings wisdom.
totems.teaching: Wolf teaches the balance between independence and community loyalty.

totems.name: Falcon
totems.guidance: Rise above challenges with clear vision. Swift action leads to success.
totems.teaching: Falcon teaches us to see the bigger picture and strike with precision.

totems.name: Beaver
totems.guidance: Build steadily toward your goals. Your persistence creates lasting foundations.
totems.teaching: Beaver teaches that steady work and cooperation create abundance.

totems.name: Deer
totems.guidance: Move through life with grace. Gentleness is strength, not weakness.
totems.teaching: Deer teaches us to be alert, gentle, and adaptable in all situations.

totems.name: Woodpecker
totems.guidance: Create a safe haven for loved ones. Your rhythm guides others home.
totems.teaching: Woodpecker teaches us to find opportunity by listening to life's rhythms.

totems.name: Salmon
totems.guidance: Return to your source of strength. Swim upstream when necessary.
totems.teaching: Salmon teaches that true strength comes from following your inner compass.

totems.name: Bear
totems.guidance: Embrace solitude for inner growth. Rest is as important as action.
totems.teaching: Bear teaches us that true power comes from introspection and self-knowledge.

totems.name: Raven
totems.guidance: Transform challenges into opportunities. Magic lives in perspective shifts.
totems.teaching: Raven teaches us that transformation is the only constant in life.

totems.name: Snake
totems.guidance: Shed old patterns fearlessly. Rebirth requires releasing the past.
totems.teaching: Snake teaches us that true healing comes through shedding what no longer serves.

totems.name: Owl
totems.guidance: See through darkness to truth. Silent observation reveals hidden wisdom.
totems.teaching: Owl teaches us to see beyond illusions and trust our inner knowing.

totems.name: Goose
totems.guidance: Fly in formation toward your goals. Success requires both discipline and cooperation.
totems.teaching: Goose teaches that together we fly farther than we ever could alone.
